full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: Furniture for RCMP Work Spaces
---

#### Tenders Submission and Closing Date
* **Public Tender Announcement Date**: May 10, 2024
* **Tenders Closing Date**: May 28, 2024, 14:00 (EST)
* **Required Delivery Date**: August 30, 2024

#### Product Specifications and Requirements
* **Procurement**: Finalized under PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) E60PQ-140003/C, covering 3 Product categories:
  * **Product Category 1**: Interconnecting Panels and Freestanding Systems
  * **Product Category 2**: Height-Adjustable Desk/Table Products
  * **Product Category 6**: Support Space - Collaborative Furniture
* **Requirement**: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires the purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture to Ottawa, ON
* **Security Requirements**: For additional information, consult the bid solicitation document

#### Contract and Procurement Details
* **Solicitation Number**: 202402348
* **Contracting Entity**: Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)
* **Procurement Category**: Government of Canada (GD)
* **Trade Agreements**: Not Applicable (CFTA does not apply)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: Ottawa

#### Tenders Submission
Tenders should be prepared and submitted electronically through [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca). Additional documents, such as [Floor Plan](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38007/202402348---floor-plan-autocad.zip), [Panel Plan](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38007/202402348---panel-plan.pdf) and [RFP documents](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38007/202402348---rfb-%28psib.pdf) are downloadable through the same website.

#### Contract Requirements
The bid solicitation document outlines detailed terms and conditions of the tender. A representative of the RCMP will be available for further inquiries.

#### Contact Information
For further inquiries, please contact:
Victoria Amira
 Phone: (343) 596-9464
Email: victoria.amira@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
